title: Unable to access legacy client
body: It looks like it is trying to repair but then fails. The new client still too laggy and causing me to miss games/bans

replies.body:
I'm sorry to hear you're having issues with both clients at this point. We've seen some performance issues with the Beta Client on lower-end hardware. Have you tried using the Low-spec mode and disabling animations? You can access these settings in the Beta Client from the cog in the top right. I've included a screenshot below:

(Click to enlarge)
http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

If you still have issues with the Beta Client after making those changes, we can work on getting you back on the Legacy Client, just let me know.

Yeah, I deleted the folder and got legacy to work by reinstalling the game. Low spec helped, but the new client would slow to a crawl randomly. Most of the time it would be fine then the accept button would appear and vanish before I could click it.

I'm glad you got the Legacy Client up and running again. Yeah, since you're still having issues performance-wise with the Beta, you may need to hold off on using it until we've added more optimizations to it. You'll still be able to access everything gameplay-wise from the Legacy Client, you just won't be able to access replays and highlights, since they're part of the Beta Client's platform.

Let me know if you have any questions.
